item.title: Finance in the 21st Century
item.description: I teach an engaging summer school course at the University of Warwick, specifically tailored for about 200 pre-university students from across the world. This course covers three significant areas: the evolving landscape of digital currencies like Bitcoin and their potential to redefine traditional monetary systems; the vital role of central banks in addressing the global climate crisis and maintaining financial stability; and the impact of big financial data, AI, machine learning, and algorithmic trading on financial markets
